column1: Sunday Firesides: As I Am Now

column1: What to Do If You Get Kicked in the Nards
column3: One of the downsides of being a man is that our reproductive organs, i.e., our nards, hang outside of our bodies, leaving them vulnerable to impact. When your nards take a hit, it hurts. A lot.
